entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:24 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 8:24 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
